welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Prestatyn! This charming seaside town is known for its beautiful beaches, stunning views, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal flights and special charters.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first 2 hours and then a fee may apply for longer usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
